verses.roman:
nija-rūpa prabhu tāṅre karāila darśana
catur-bhuja-rūpa prabhu hā-ilā takhana

synonyms: nija-rūpa—personal form; prabhu—the Lord; tāṅre—unto him; karāila—made; darśana—seeing; catuḥ-bhuja—four-handed; rūpa—form; prabhu—the Lord; ha-ilā—became; takhana—at that time.
translation: To show him mercy, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu allowed him to see His Viṣṇu form. Thus He immediately assumed four hands.
